reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major congenital limb malformation syndromes: polydactyly (~80 per 100k), limb reduction defects (~30 per 100k), club foot (~40 per 100k), arthrogryposis (~5 per 100k), other skeletal dysplasias (~25 per 100k). Total ~180 per 100k births. Low confidence due to heterogeneity and diagnostic overlap.
